name: market for stockpiling of anode slime from electrorefining of copper, anode | stockpiling of anode slime from electrorefining of copper, anode | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/10855/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'stockpiling of anode slime from electrorefining of copper, anode', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;This is delivering the service of 'stockpiling of anode slime from electrorefining of copper, anode'. Stockpiling is a way of assuring provision and control over supplies, and is systematically applied with some commodities by several countries. This dataset represents the stockpilling of "anode slime, silver and tellurium containing, from refining of primary copper"  it considers to happen in the geographical sourroundings of the mine producing the concentrate. The service includes only the infrastructure for the storage tank and the input of the anode slime from electrorefining of copper.

This activity starts with the service generation.


This activity ends with the service supplied to its consumers. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
category: C:Manufacturing/24:Manufacture of basic metals/242:Manufacture of basic precious and other non-ferrous metals/2420:Manufacture of basic precious and other non-ferrous metals
